sentences.sContent: When things had flavor , we knew what we were eating all the while ----and it satisfied us .
sentences.sContent_eng: When things had flavor , we knew what we were eating all the while ----and it satisfied us .
sentences.sCn: 当食物有滋味的时候，我们从头到尾都知道自己吃的是什么，从中得到满足。

sentences.sContent: I consider the eels to be the best quality protein in my line—a very unique flavor of fish, applewood smoke, and a momentary lingering of dark, fall honey.
sentences.sContent_eng: I consider the eels to be the best quality protein in my line—a very unique flavor of fish, applewood smoke, and a momentary lingering of dark, fall honey.
sentences.sCn: 我认为，在我的行当里，鳗鱼是最优质的蛋白质——一种非常独特的风味鱼，用苹果木烟熏，在暗处晾一会，再抹上秋天的蜂蜜。

phrases.pCn: 天然香辛料；天然调味料

words.tran: 可口的（等于flavourful）；充满…味道的；有香味的
